General.Name: Hunan Haili Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Haili Chemical Industry Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and trades in pesticides, chemical fertilizers, and chemical products in China. It offers insecticides, fungicides, phosgenation products, pesticide intermediates, and seed coating agents under the Haili brand name. The company also installs mechanical and electrical devices. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
General.Address: No. 251, Furong Middle Road, Changsha, China, 410007

6.Name: Mr. Liu Hong  Bo
